mapper.select: SELECT B.AUTH FROM USERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTHENTICATE B ON(A.USERNAME = B.USERNAME) WHERE A.USERNAME = #{user}
SELECT pkg_crypto.decrypt(PASSWORD) PASSWORD FROM USERS WHERE USERNAME = #{user}

SELECT C.STU_NUM AS stuNum, C.DEPT_NUM AS deptNum, C.STU_NM_KOR AS stuNmKor, D.AUTH AS auth FROM STUDENT C LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT A.USERNAME AS USERNAME, B.AUTH AS AUTH FROM USERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTHENTICATE B ON(A.USERNAME = B.USERNAME) WHERE A.USERNAME = #{stuNum})D ON(C.STU_NUM = D.USERNAME) WHERE C.STU_NUM = #{stuNum}

SELECT C.TEA_NUM AS teaNum, C.DEPT_NUM AS deptNum, C.TEA_NM_KOR AS teaNmKor, D.AUTH AS auth FROM TEACHER C LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT A.USERNAME AS USERNAME, B.AUTH AS AUTH FROM USERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTHENTICATE B ON(A.USERNAME = B.USERNAME) WHERE A.USERNAME = #{teaNum}) D ON(C.TEA_NUM = D.USERNAME) WHERE C.TEA_NUM = #{teaNum}

SELECT C.EMP_NUM AS empNum, C.EMP_NM_KOR AS empNmKor, D.AUTH AS auth FROM EMPLOYEE C LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT A.USERNAME AS USERNAME, B.AUTH AS AUTH FROM USERS A LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTHENTICATE B ON(A.USERNAME = B.USERNAME) WHERE A.USERNAME = #{empNum})D ON(C.EMP_NUM = D.USERNAME) WHERE C.EMP_NUM = #{empNum}

SELECT A.STU_NUM username, A.DEPT_NUM deptNum, A.STU_NM_KOR name, A.STU_PHOTO photo, A.STU_STATUS status, D.AUTH auth, D.PASSWORD password FROM STUDENT A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.AUTH AUTH, B.USERNAME USERNAME, pkg_crypto.decrypt(C.PASSWORD) PASSWORD FROM AUTHENTICATE B LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS C ON(B.USERNAME = C.USERNAME) WHERE C.USERNAME = #{username})D ON(A.STU_NUM = D.USERNAME) WHERE A.STU_NUM = #{username}

SELECT A.TEA_NUM username, A.DEPT_NUM deptNum, A.TEA_NM_KOR name, A.TEA_PHOTO photo, A.MAJOR major, D.AUTH auth, D.PASSWORD password FROM TEACHER A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.AUTH AUTH, B.USERNAME USERNAME, pkg_crypto.decrypt(C.PASSWORD) PASSWORD FROM AUTHENTICATE B LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS C ON(B.USERNAME = C.USERNAME) WHERE C.USERNAME = #{username})D ON(A.TEA_NUM = D.USERNAME) WHERE A.TEA_NUM = #{username}

SELECT A.EMP_NUM username, A.EMP_NM_KOR name, A.EMP_PHOTO photo, D.AUTH auth, D.PASSWORD password FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.AUTH AUTH, B.USERNAME USERNAME, pkg_crypto.decrypt(C.PASSWORD) PASSWORD FROM AUTHENTICATE B LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS C ON(B.USERNAME = C.USERNAME) WHERE C.USERNAME = #{username})D ON(A.EMP_NUM = D.USERNAME) WHERE A.EMP_NUM = #{username}
